titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount of the deduction allowed for meals and entertainment expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 11/7/1997--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase (from 50 percent), in increments, the meals and entertainment deduction to 80 percent for calendar years 2008 and thereafter.
